title: The Substitute
writer: Diego Lerman, María Meira, Luciana De Mello
short_cast: Juan Minujín, Alfredo Castro, Bárbara Lennie, María Merlino, Lucas Arrua, Renata Lerman, Rita Cortese, Brian Montiel, Solana Azulay, Morena Anselmino
cast: Juan Minujín, Alfredo Castro, Bárbara Lennie, María Merlino, Lucas Arrua, Renata Lerman, Rita Cortese, Brian Montiel, Solana Azulay, Morena Anselmino
genre: Argentinian, Social Issue Dramas, Crime Movies, Dramas
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: A highbrow literature professor returns to his old neighborhood to teach high school, facing his past, his father and the reality of his community.
